metdetection.utils

Class Evaluation

  • java.lang.Object
    • metdetection.utils.Evaluation

  • public class Evaluation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Evaluation can be used to perform global evaluation on some output file.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 9 September, 2016

      • getNumLevels

        private static int getNumLevels(java.lang.String line)
        Return the number of levels on the given line of Temperley output. That is, the number of occurrences of "x " on that line.
        Parameters:
        line - The line we are searching.
        Returns:
        The number of levels on the given line.

      • getAccuracyString

        public static java.lang.String getAccuracyString(Measure correctMeasure,
                                 int correctSubBeatLength,
                                 int correctAnacrusisLength,
                                 Measure hypothesisMeasure,
                                 int hypothesisSubBeatLength,
                                 int hypothesisAnacrusisLength)
        Get the accuracy String for a metrical hypothesis.
        Parameters:
        correctMeasure - The correct measure.
        correctSubBeatLength - The correct sub beat length, in ticks.
        correctAnacrusisLength - The correct anacrusis length, in ticks.
        hypothesisMeasure - The hypothesis measure.
        hypothesisSubBeatLength - The hypothesis sub beat length, in ticks.
        hypothesisAnacrusisLength - The hypothesis anacrusis length, in ticks.
        Returns:
        The accuracy string for the given hypothesis.

      • getMatch

        private static int getMatch(int length,
           int offset,
           Measure correctMeasure,
           int correctSubBeatLength,
           int correctAnacrusisLength)
        Get the match type of a grouping of the given length and offset given the correct measure, anacrusis length, and sub beat length.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the grouping we want to check.
        offset - The offset of the grouping we want to check.
        correctMeasure - The correct measure of this song.
        correctSubBeatLength - The correct sub beat length.
        correctAnacrusisLength - The correct anacrusis length, measured in tacti.
        Returns:
        A value less than 0 if this grouping overlaps some correct tree boundary. A value greater than 0 if this grouping matches a correct tree boundary exactly. A value of 0 otherwise, for example if the grouping lies under the lowest grouping, but could be grouped up into a correct grouping.

      • getNoteFileString

        private static java.lang.String getNoteFileString(java.io.File file)
        Convert the given input file out into a note file.
        Parameters:
        file - The input file to be converted into a note file.
        Returns:
        The String of the note file for the given input file.

      • evaluateLpcfg

        private static void evaluateLpcfg()
        Evaluate the input lpcfg results. That is, compute and print the global FN, FP, TP, P, R, and F1 from std in.

      • argumentError

        private static void argumentError(java.lang.String message)
        Some argument error occurred. Print the message to std err and exit.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to print to std err.
